TopicTitle: War of Insanity Unofficial Fan and Informational page (seeking new members)

Articles.Content:
Here's a forum that we could do it on. And it's a great game too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://powdertoy.co.uk/Discussions/Categories/Index.html](http://powdertoy.co.uk/Discussions/Categories/Index.html)

I can make the thread if everyone wants to.
I contacted him and asked him where our thread belongs.

> 
> I contacted him and asked him where our thread belongs.

That wasn't what he was getting at at all! He was just concerned about the OP in the fact that it wasn't crystal clear about the rules we are following or the existing characters' info.

Sampa, back me up here.

[http://boards.theforce.net/conversations/rpf-thread.6937621/](http://boards.theforce.net/conversations/rpf-thread.6937621/)
Um...It won't let me view the conversation! You'll need to add me to the conversation manually
Man, what a tricky forum.
It just takes some learning
So... I'm working on it. I'll give you the thread tomorrow. DON't ACCESS IT UNTIL THEN. Gotta modify it.
Ok, removing the url until then.
Thanks

> 
> Thanks

No problem. If you want, i can provide you with a small character bio for myself later!

It is saved! And there is no need to resort to fighting against the banhammers (which can be done but requires a certain skillset and a level of which I do not possess nor have any intent to acquire in the near future).

> 
> It is saved! And there is no need to resort to fighting against the banhammers (which can be done but requires a certain skillset and a level of which I do not possess nor have any intent to acquire in the near future).

Glad to be of service. There was certainly no way we could let a simple locked thread or too kill the story. Now we just need to clear a,few hurdles on the new location before i am able to post the location url. But, the story WILL continue!
I'm probably not going to participate as I don't really want a million accounts, and the site doesn't really look trustworthy.

> 
> I'm probably not going to participate as I don't really want a million accounts, and the site doesn't really look trustworthy.

I'm sorry to hear that. You will be missed!
Hey, Laythe, I know you are wanting to leave, but would you consider finishing the current part of the story and just exing your character off at the end, just to make it official?

> 
> Hey, Laythe, I know you are wanting to leave, but would you consider finishing the current part of the story and just exing your character off at the end, just to make it official?

It wouldnt be hard for anyone to come up with some reason for his character to exit. I've had to help come up with reasons twice for D&D campaigns, plus some of my buddies and I had an RP chat room for a while and I was evil with my ability to write things in ways to get people invested (and then turn around 2 sessions later and destroy their emotional investment with no warning).

> 
> It wouldnt be hard for anyone to come up with some reason for his character to exit. I've had to help come up with reasons twice for D&D campaigns, plus some of my buddies and I had an RP chat room for a while and I was evil with my ability to write things in ways to get people invested (and then turn around 2 sessions later and destroy their emotional investment with no warning).

Yeah, it was just with the sound of his motion to leave, i think he's done. A level finallity is necessary imho. Something only the death of his character could bring. I was hoping he'd be will to stay with us long enough to make that happen in a heroic fashion.

> 
> Yeah, it was just with the sound of his motion to leave, i think he's done. A level finallity is necessary imho. Something only the death of his character could bring. I was hoping he'd be will to stay with us long enough to make that happen in a heroic fashion.

So that means what exactly? Wrap up to this story and the beginning of a full reboot? Are people still going to go with god-tier characters? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> So that means what exactly? Wrap up to this story and the beginning of a full reboot? Are people still going to go with god-tier characters? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Are you asking if we are going to redo the start of the story? Also, junior has placed a ban on certain god-like aspects, namely the multiverse concept. To difficult for fairness and the story in general. Other aspects are being accepted, like the biotics from mass effect.

Please fill this out and send it to me in a private message before you can join the new thread:

Fill this for out using copy/paste:

Name:

Government name:

Species:

Defining features:

Home planet/system:

> 
> Please fill this out and send it to me in a private message before you can join the new thread:
> Fill this for out using copy/paste:
> 
> Name:
> 
> Government name:
> 
> Species:
> 
> Defining features:
> 
> Home planet/system:

This include me?
Yeah... sorry. Required.

> 
> Yeah... sorry. Required.

Ok, that's fine by me. Btw, with laythe abandoning us, we need to discuss the possibility of a reboot...
Or I can start writing up a tragic suicide mission for him.
